long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
what happens when 50 of each rock, paper, and scissors fight with each other?

well, let's see who wins !!!

# features
1. change the fighting speed
2. stats saved for every fight
3. new features will be added as the game progress
